name: tibetan-translator
description: An attempt at providing access to the best Tibetan dictionaries in a pleasant interface for all devices.
author: Lekshe (Jeremy FRERE)

scripts.release:patch: node ./scripts/bump-version.js patch && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add -A && git commit -m "Bumps to $VERSION" && git tag "v$VERSION" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: node ./scripts/bump-version.js minor && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add -A && git commit -m "Bumps to $VERSION" && git tag "v$VERSION" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: node ./scripts/bump-version.js major && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add -A && git commit -m "Bumps to $VERSION" && git tag "v$VERSION" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.clear:cache: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path'),{platform,homedir}=require('os');const dirs={darwin:p.join(homedir(),'Library/Application Support/com.jerefrer.TibetanTranslator/packs'),win32:p.join(homedir(),'AppData/Roaming/com.jerefrer.TibetanTranslator/packs'),linux:p.join(homedir(),'.local/share/com.jerefrer.TibetanTranslator/packs')};const d=dirs[platform()];if(!d){console.log('Unknown platform, skipping cache clear');process.exit(0)}['core.sqlite','core.meta.json','tibetan-monolingual.sqlite','tibetan-monolingual.meta.json','sanskrit-academic.sqlite','sanskrit-academic.meta.json'].forEach(f=>{const fp=p.join(d,f);try{fs.unlinkSync(fp);console.log('Removed',fp)}catch(e){if(e.code!=='ENOENT')throw e}});console.log('Pack cache cleared')"
